title: Provide a shareable published app link (copy-to-clipboard) for users

requirements.text: Add a user-facing "Copy link" action that copies the current app URL to the clipboard so the user can share/open the published app via a single link.

quotes: ok publish now and give me the download link

acceptanceCriteria: A new UI control labeled "Copy link" is available in the customer-facing UI (e.g., in the top header).
Clicking "Copy link" copies the current window location URL (including any hash/route) to the clipboard.
After copying, a toast/notification is shown with English text confirming success (e.g., "Link copied").
If clipboard access fails, show an English error toast (e.g., "Could not copy link") and do not crash.

requirements.text: Expose the same "Copy link" action in the Admin Dashboard area so admins can easily copy/share the published app URL.

quotes: ok publish now and give me the download link

acceptanceCriteria: Admins can access a "Copy link" control from the admin area UI (e.g., within the Admin dashboard page header or a clearly visible section).
The copied URL matches the current URL as seen in the browser address bar.
Success and failure feedback are shown using English toasts/notifications.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not add any backend/canister methods for this request; copying/sharing the link must be implemented purely on the frontend.
nonGoals: Actually deploying/publishing the app to production as part of code changes.
Generating an external "download link" hosted outside the app (e.g., file hosting) or packaging native installers.
